content.name: Player POI
content.author: Chem O`Dun
content.description:
Implementation of player POI (point of interest) system, allowing players to create and manage custom POIs in on the map and in space.
[h2][b]Features[/b][/h2] [list] [*] [b]Creation of custom POIs[/b] on the map at any location. [*] [b]Assignment of POIs to objects[/b] on map or in space (non player stations and gates). [*] [b]Automatic name generation[/b] for POIs based on the assigned object or location. [*] [b]Automatic POI assignment[/b] to found abandoned ships and lockboxes (if configured). [*] [b]POI management tab[/b] in the Property Owned Information. [*] [b]Context menu[/b] for POIs in space and on the map, allowing to rename or self-destruct POIs. [*] [b]Optimized rename window location[/b] to be close to the selected POI. [/list] [h2][b]Requirements[/b][/h2] [list] [*] [b]X4: Foundations[/b]: Version 8.00HF3 or newer. [*] [b]UI Extensions and HUD[/b]: Version v8.0.4.0 or higher by [url=https://next.nexusmods.com/profile/kuertee?gameId=2659]kuertee[/url]. [list] [*] Available on Nexus Mods: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/x4foundations/mods/552]UI Extensions and HUD[/url] [/list] [*] [b]Mod Support APIs[/b]: Version 1.95 or higher by [url=https://next.nexusmods.com/profile/sirnukes?gameId=2659]SirNukes[/url]. [list] [*] Available on Steam: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2042901274]SirNukes Mod Support APIs[/url] [*] Available on Nexus Mods: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/x4foundations/mods/503]Mod Support APIs[/url] [/list] [/list] [h2][b]Compatibility[/b][/h2] [list] [*] With [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/x4foundations/mods/842]Custom Tabs[/url] mod by [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/x4foundations/users/7018859]Mycu[/url] [/list] [h2]Limitations[/h2] [list] [*] As there is standard [b]Rename[/b] window is used for renaming POIs, there is a standard game limitation on the name length that can be applied. [*] [b]POI[/b] is not attached to the assigned object, so there is no limitation on count of [b]POIs[/b] that can be assigned to the same object, but also it means that if the assigned object is moved or destroyed, the [b]POI[/b] will remain in its original location and will not be updated or removed. [/list] [h2][b]Installation[/b][/h2] [list] [*] [b]Steam Workshop[/b]: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3672692813]Player POI[/url] [*] [b]Nexus Mods[/b]: [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/x4foundations/mods/1990]Player POI[/url] [/list]
[h2][b]Credits[/b][/h2] [list] [*] [b]Author[/b]: Chem O`Dun, on [url=https://next.nexusmods.com/profile/ChemODun/mods?gameId=2659]Nexus Mods[/url] and [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/chemodun/myworkshopfiles/?appid=392160]Steam Workshop[/url] [*] [i]"X4: Foundations"[/i] is a trademark of [url=https://www.egosoft.com]Egosoft[/url]. [/list] [h2][b]Acknowledgements[/b][/h2] [list] [*] [url=https://www.egosoft.com]EGOSOFT[/url] — for the X series. [*] [url=https://next.nexusmods.com/profile/kuertee?gameId=2659]kuertee[/url] — for the [b]UI Extensions and HUD[/b] that makes this extension possible. [*] [url=https://next.nexusmods.com/profile/sirnukes?gameId=2659]SirNukes[/url] — for the [b]Mod Support APIs[/b] that power the UI hooks. [/list]
